newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Eight dead in drug gang warfare in Brazil.
newsitem.headline: Eight dead in drug gang warfare in Brazil.

text.p: Eight alleged drug traffickers were shot dead in fighting between rival gangs in mountainside shanty-towns above Rio's Ipanema and Copacabana beaches, police said on Sunday.
Gunbattles in the Cantagalo and Pavao-Pavaozinho slums began on Thursday and raged for three consecutive nights, an officer at a nearby police station said.
Four bodies were removed on Sunday, raising the death toll for the three nights of violence to eight, he said.
Hundreds of residents of the two shanty-towns were reported to have fled their homes to avoid the shooting.
